mapper.select: select s.maker,s.swname,s.used,s.quantity, (select count(*) from tb_equipsw es where es.swnumber=s.swnumber) as 설치수, s.quantity-(select count(*) from tb_equipsw es where es.swnumber=s.swnumber) as 부족수량 from tb_sw s Where s.maker='Adobe' ORDER BY s.swname;
select * from tb_employee where employeenumber = #{employeenumber} AND password=#{password}
